MESSAGE.name: Mcc_analysis.not_in_cc_order2
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] runs must be cc ordered to perform this operation

MESSAGE.name: Mcc_analysis.not_in_cc_order
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] Runs must be in CC order

MESSAGE.name: Mcc_analysis.not_in_yx_order2
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] cc_analysis: Runs must be in YX order

MESSAGE.name: Mcc_analysis.not_in_yx_order
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] Inside a CC, runs must Y-X ordered

MESSAGE.name: Mfilter.bad_height
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] pix images must have same height as run image

MESSAGE.name: Mfilter.bad_width
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] pix images must have same width as run image

MESSAGE.name: Mfilter.not_300dpi
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] input runs must be at least 300dpi

MESSAGE.name: Mfilter.not_cc_or_yx
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] ccs must CC or YX ordered

MESSAGE.name: Mfilter.not_in_yx_order
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] Runs must be in YX order

MESSAGE.name: Mglobal.bad_proportion
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] ratio_x: image and subimage must have proportionate width

MESSAGE.name: Mglobal.bad_ratios
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] image ratios must be the same along x and y

MESSAGE.name: Mglobal.bad_resolution
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] Image must have same x and y resolution

MESSAGE.name: Mglobal.bad_subsample
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] subimage subsampling factor must be a multiple of original subsampling

MESSAGE.name: Mglobal.cant_copy
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] not allowed to copy data if image is non allocable

MESSAGE.name: Mglobal.cant_steal1
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] not allowed to steal data if image is non allocable

MESSAGE.name: Mglobal.cant_steal2
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] not allowed to steal data if image is still locked

MESSAGE.name: Mglobal.cant_steal3
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] not allowed to steal data which was already borrowed!

MESSAGE.name: Mglobal.not_directly
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] class Mimage cannot be destroyed directly. Consider making this method virtual

MESSAGE.name: Mglobal.only_borrowed
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] can only shift idxs with borrowed data

MESSAGE.name: Mglobal.still_locked
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] Trying to free an image which is still locked

MESSAGE.name: Mhistogrid.bad_means
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] Problem in the Markov mean estimation: BG and FG cannot have identical means

MESSAGE.name: Mhistogrid.few_blocks
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] Not enough blocks to choose threshold

MESSAGE.name: Mhistogrid.out_of_image
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] block gets out of the allocated image

MESSAGE.name: Mmasksub.diff_height
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] image and mask must have same height

MESSAGE.name: Mmasksub.diff_width
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] image and mask must have same width

MESSAGE.name: Mmorpho.bad_dilation
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] output dilation must be smaller than dilation used to compute the color cost

MESSAGE.name: Mmorpho.too_small
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] block size too small for dilation

MESSAGE.name: Mpixel_image.cant_unmap_image
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] cannot unmap data of a image which is free_locked

MESSAGE.name: Mpixel_image.not_gray_1
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] Not a grey image with 1 byte/pixel

MESSAGE.name: Mpixel_image.P5_or_P6
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] PNM should be P5 or P6

MESSAGE.name: Mpixel_image.unk_color
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] image has unknown color representation (neither RGB nor BGR)

MESSAGE.name: Mrun_image.free_RunImage
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] free RunImage before applying filter method

MESSAGE.name: Mrun_image.not_cc_order
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] filter runs must be in CC order

MESSAGE.name: Mrun_image.not_yx_order
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] base Runs must be in YX order

MESSAGE.name: Msegmenter.bad_ratio
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] resolution ratio between grey and color image should be either 1 or bg_subsample

MESSAGE.name: Msegmenter.bad_status
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] image must be either allocated or attached to an opened stream

MESSAGE.name: Msegmenter.segmenter
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] segmenter output not OK for Wavelet and JB2 encoding

MESSAGE.name: Msegmenter.too_wide
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] Image width exceeds short integer range

MESSAGE.name: Msubsampler.bad_ymax
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] ymax not a multiple of substep

MESSAGE.name: Msubsampler.bad_ymin
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] ymin not a multiple of substep

MESSAGE.name: Msubsampler.need_color
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] Require a real color image as sub_img

MESSAGE.name: Msubsampler.proprotions
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] Grey and color image must have same proportions

MESSAGE.name: Msubsampler.unk_color
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] image has unknown color representation (neither RGB nor BGR)

MESSAGE.name: Msubsampler.ymin_range2
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] ymin is out of subimage range

MESSAGE.name: Msubsampler.ymin_range3
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] ymin is out of sub-mask range
